review:
Thank you is very small for guardian angel  (Dr. Shikha Gurnani)

As of today, I dont mind saying that Dr. Gurnani was not only my wife's doctor for pregnancy but was like a mother and guardian angel who delivered an angel to us after three years of her medical efforts and my wife's two miscarriages.  
Would like to give you a crisp background to substantiate the headline.

First Year_Dec 2016
I went to the doctor in 2016 Dec for my wife's first pregnancy after reading reviews on practo. I can tell you that I didn't feel its my first visit, the staff was very courteous but i was concerned about the doctor considering my past experiences with other doctors who were rude and arrogant.  But doctor removed all my preconceived notions and welcomed us as she knew us before. 
Doctor started the treatment but unfortunately our baby couldn't survive more that 1.5 months and my wife went under D&C. I thought that Doctor like others will not be bothered about our loss but she tried to console us like a mother.

Second Year_Dec 2018

After the first miscarriage, we planned again in 2018 and visited the doctor. I was surprised to see that not only the staff but doctor knew our names even after 2 years. Doctor was happier than us to see us once again and she started the treatment once again but unfortunately our baby didint survive again after 1.5 months from the conception.  Doctor was also surprised with that but you cannot change whats written in your destiny.  Even in that situation i didnt lose my trust on doctor and left everything to her for further treatment whereas if it could have been other patient then they could have blamed the doctor.

Third Year_July 2019

After the completion of healing period we visited the "same" doctor once again in July 2019 for the treatment. I still remember the conversation, Doctor said "I will not leave any stone unturned and will apply whatever i have learned to make you proud parents but you need to trust me" and I replied " I wont be standing here with my wife once again, I have immense trust in you". Doctor advised us some tests & medicines and started the treatment. During the course of the treatment, Doctor used to advise and guide us like a mother not as a doctor. She was available for us all the time (but we didnt took advantage of that and didnt disturb her in nights and weekends unless its urgent and critical). Even this pregnancy was not a cake walk for us but doctor held our hands and walked with us throughout the pregnancy. There were high chances of caesarean but doctor was pushing for normal delivery and i was astonished when my wife delivered the baby girl in the night of 31st March through normal delivery. 

I cannot pay back ever to the doctor what she has done for us, Doctor came like a guardian angel in our life who filled our life with everlasting happiness. I can keep on writing but it will not be enough.

When u hold ur tiny angel in your hands for the first time - you become a parent. That‚Äôs what often people say, but they are wrong. 
The day one gets to know that they have conceived is when the journey of parenthood begins.
We were early birds üòÅ... figured it out in the 3rd week that we had conceived. Being proactive I had shortlisted a few and finalized onto one particular doctor basis on the reviews, rating, experience from Practo before hand.  So we rushed with the pregnancy kit test to her. 
A calm and composed, yet chirpy doctor on the other side... she had her mask on, but from her eyes I could read that she had a wide smile. She said that it looks that you have passed but let‚Äôs run some tests and be sure. That‚Äôs my baby‚Äôs first date with doctor Gurnani. 
In those 9 months I went through a lot - not being able to gain weight initially, a bit of complications in the ultra sound, a small car accident and got infected with Coronavirus ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è.
Being from hospitality I was working 14 hours - traveling 60kms - and constantly on my feet - parents in a different city. The reason I am sharing all this is because I want you to understand what kind of support I got from her. 
There are times I would msg her with silly questions, would rush  into the clinic with serious issues and a lot more...but there was not a single time I gave a second thought about considering someone else. My husband would make fun of me, that I often found reasons to meet her as it was comforting. May be it was true.
I wanted a normal delivery. She had recommended to stay active without stressing and I chose to work till the last month and one day I was at work and wasn‚Äôt sure if I was in labor so I messaged her and rushed once she confirmed.

As she was stitching me up and scolding me like a momma ... I laughed and said - u can‚Äôt get irritated - m gonna come back in a  few years for the next one. 
For me to say that on the table, at that point - you can understand what kind of trust she must have instilled in me.
